message: Just got a new Macbook Air and I'm loving it. I have noticed one quirk though, and wondered if anyone else had seen the same: My left and right arrow keys are super-sensitive -- I can get them to register keypresses without depressing the key the whole way. This is a bit annoying because it's led me to accidentally advance slideshows.
@levity I haven't experienced that. It's possible that you have a lemon.
